website_summaries.verdict: With its incredible comfortability, high durability and optimal traction, the Under Armour Dash RN 2 has earned a large number of fans. For many neutral runners, it is a wise choice when it comes to finding a long-term, comfortable shoe at an affordable price.
pros: Most runners mentioned that the shoe was ‘super comfortable’ owing to its midsole foam
The consumers seemed very happy with the good flexibility provided by the pair of shoes
The purchasers highlighted that the shoe offered great attributes at a very reasonable price
A few runners noticed that this shoe had a strong and durable build
Some customers lauded the good traction capability of the outsole
they felt that it worked well on wet and dry surfaces
A purchaser said that it was very easy to keep the shoe clean
A runner admired the snug fit of the shoe since it prevented the foot from slipping or wobbling inside the foot-chamber during his running sessions
Some users thought that the Under Armour Dash RN 2 was very stylish and pleasing to look at
cons: A number of wearers commented on the shoe's poor build quality
A couple of users noticed that the tongue at the top of the shoe does not cover the entire top part of their feet

customer_reviews.title: Not great.
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of these shoes. Fairly comfortable. Run a little small. I wear a size 9, really could've used a 9.5. Durability, not great. After 2 months fabric is beginning to rip by shoelace. The tongue in this shoe is enough to drive u crazy. It is far to small and if slightly out of place you can see your sock. I should've listened to the other reviewers. 😔 I expected better from under armour. I don't know that I will purchase shoes made by them again. This was my 1st pair and I'm not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: melhels

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes for all day wear similar to ASICS!
customer_reviews.text: I've been a fan of ASICS running shoes in the past but decided to give this Under Armour shoes a try. I was pleasantly surprised how comfortable this shoes is. It's as light as ASICS running shoes while providing good cushions. It's true to its size and I can wear this all day, every day and even play sports or go for a run with this. It's stylish in color and design so I can wear this with shorts or even with long jeans or khakis. THE BOTTOM LINE: 5 out of 5 stars! Highly recommend this shoes.
customer_reviews.author: DavidsList 📝👍💬✅

customer_reviews.title: Awsome color, perfect fit, VERY comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Loved the color first and foremost. As usual, it's Under Armour, need I say more. Ok, I will! They fit as expected and are perfect as usual. The MOST comfortable brand I've ever owned. They seem durable and have good form. Ive only worn them 2 times so far, but ALL of my other UA sneaks have lasted right until the last rip. And I say rip bc I use the worth out of all my UA until they're not usable any more....and they LAST!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stryker81

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for the money so far. Very roomy in the toes, which I think is good. Good breath ability. And the arches aren’t too high which is also great. If you want wide open spaces the 4E is no joke
customer_reviews.author: Stan M. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good price comfy shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are my first UA shoes.... they fit well. I walk about 17,000 steps a day at school as an advisor. These are super light and comfy. I'm no little guy and these are holding up well but I have only worn them about 5 times. I'll come back to report....
customer_reviews.author: Bob H.

customer_reviews.title: I love Under Armour but had to get a more orthopedic shoe for longer walks
customer_reviews.text: Darling! Looked great. Shape of heel and toe are exactly what I wanted. Returned it because my back needs more support than this cute little sneaker provides. I even used an insert for my arch and heel, but it didn't help. If my back was healthier, these would be great. Just the right amount of bright pink on a wear-everywhere black background.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pinter

customer_reviews.title: Highly Rated Running Shoe for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I am a 55 year old male, only have been running for 18 months. 3 - 3.5 mile runs. Had an inexpensive Reebok that I was using but decided to upgrade. I bought and tried a lot and was disappointed until now. ASICS Gel Excite 4 - felt too heavy; PUMA Speed 600 - uncomfortable; Brooks Revel - my feet hurt after just a mile; Nike Zoom Strike - too narrow. The Under Armour Dash 2 feel great so far. Light and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: Under armour sneakers run a little smaller than normal. My husband normally wears a 9.5 but in UA he wears a 10. We buy only UA since his first pair 4 years ago. They are durable and these are priced great. My husband has circulation issues after a car accident in 2017 so footwear is extremely important and these don’t disappoint. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: M S Brown

customer_reviews.title: Bang for buck..just didn’t fit my feet
customer_reviews.text: Decent shoes. Material felt ok. My shoe size is between 12-13 depending on the brand and I have wide feet. Ordered a 12 and couldn’t get my foot in. Returned and bought UA delta highlights. Amazing shoes. However for a cheap everyday shoe this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: UrbanTurbin

customer_reviews.title: Under Armour Men's UA Dash
customer_reviews.text: Under Armour sneakers run small, this is my third UA sneaker purchase. I noticed these came in extra-wide in a size larger than my own. They look great and are super light and comfortable. EXTREMELY comfortable! Not to ramble on but these are the most comfortable sneakers I've ever purchased. I was readily prepared to send them back but after I put them on WOW!
customer_reviews.author: d ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Love the bright pink/black combo!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Fit perfectly, and the mesh let’s my foot breathe. Comfortable insole. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: A little narrow, but otherwise great.
customer_reviews.text: While these shoes are great; very light and comfortable, they do run very narrow. I have small feet and usually have an issue in having way too much shoe lace to tie. Not with these, there is a small gap between the side of the shoe and the tongue. Other than that I do like them.
customer_reviews.author: SierraC

customer_reviews.title: Decent Shoe for Price
customer_reviews.text: The shoe looks good and is very light. The fit isn’t bad but a slight bit small and it’s quite a narrow shoe. I was surprised to find that the shoe is not very comfortable for running and doesn’t have much/any arch support. I get discomfort in my feet while running with these shoes because of how narrow they are. All in all they r ok for weight training (but don’t provide much stability), they look good and are surprisingly light.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Ringblum

customer_reviews.title: I have heel pain and been searching for shoes that ...
customer_reviews.text: I have heel pain and been searching for shoes that would help. I purchased these and every time I wear them, they cushion my heel so I feel the pain less each day. For me, it was a wise buy and plan on purchasing several more in various colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: defect or design flaw...tshoe tounge IS NOT attached ...
customer_reviews.text: obvious design flaw... in a discontinued shoe... the shoe tounge is not fully attached to both sided of the shoe...making for awkward slippage, and shifting in the tounge, causing the entire fit to be off and unstable... no matter how tight you lace, the tounge keeps shifting out of place.... because it's barely attached to the shoe....RETURNED !!!
customer_reviews.author: T S Camp

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to train martial arts and self defense. So they get a lot of abuse that they're not built for. They're comfortable and light. I wear them pretty everyday as and then train in them about 10 hours a week. The sole hasn't separated from the fabric. Tread looks good. No odd wear. Definitely buy another set in the future.
customer_reviews.author: David J. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Great buy for those with wide or extra wide feet.
customer_reviews.text: It's very hard to find shoes in wide or extra wide and the right length depending on brand, but the shoes fit as recommended. The return policy was free and great as well, as long as I didn't run it and get it dirty or smelly. I do like the cushioning it provides compared to my Nike Free Runs, not exactly Dr Scholl's shock absorbing but a bit more than my Nike's which I use to run faster.
customer_reviews.author: Self Developing

customer_reviews.title: The original rx were leaps better
customer_reviews.text: it seems like there is less material between this one and the original rx. they work, but not the same as the original if you were hoping. i cant spend nearly as long on my feet with these.
customer_reviews.author: Every-day-normal-guy

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes for the price but size runs small
customer_reviews.text: They seem like decent shoes for the price, but they fit much smaller than expected. For most shoes I'm a 9.5-10, but these are very small, and I would probably need to go with 10.5-11 and extra wide.
customer_reviews.author: Gusto Blue

customer_reviews.title: Good fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these on vacation when my old shoes failed catastrophically and liked them so much I bought another pair when I returned. My foot is a little wide and I have a high instep, and these shoes are very comfortable. Walking and hiking many miles over all sorts of terrain in northern Europe convinced me these were some good shoes!
customer_reviews.author: D. McCann

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable sneaker.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shoe due to the advice of my fellow gym rat. I am 6ft 230lbs and wear a size 12. Plenty of space for your big toe yet has a snug fit overall. Very comfortable sneaker.
customer_reviews.author: WAYNE

customer_reviews.title: very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My son loves these. They have more room in the toes than many brands do, and he likes that. They fit as expected and held up well. He's on his 4th pair of these, and he walks miles every day, and they lasted a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes, I was using new balance and never realized how much they sucked. These definitely added some spring to my step. I usually wear an 11 in boots cause I put inserts inside. I got a 10.5 and they fit perfectly. Not narrow and I have pretty average feet.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: TOO SMALL
customer_reviews.text: if you're accustomed wearing size 11 shoes like myself, DO NOT order a size 11, order a size up like a 11.5 or a 12. The shoes itself is too narrow for a person with wide feet like myself so hopefully a size 11.5 or a size 12 would cater for wide-footed persons who normally wear size 11 shoes. Other than that I still believe the shoes are of great quality
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Benoit

customer_reviews.title: wear to work for days I walk the 2 miles ...
customer_reviews.text: wear to work for days I walk the 2 miles in. Looks OK with kahkis enough that I dont have to change unless I go to the big bosses office..If they drop below 35 aain I will order 3 more pair.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Mike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes wear them everyday very comfortable thank you for your great service well done keep it up
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Pulido

customer_reviews.title: God shoe good fit good price.
customer_reviews.text: I have flat wide ass feet. I cannot buy shoes with arches in them because it makes my feet hurt bad. These puppies fit like a glove and feel amazing.
customer_reviews.author: This guy

customer_reviews.title: Watch the size
customer_reviews.text: These shoes have not held up well at all. I really should have sent these back cause the height of these shoes was on smaller than normal. This was not the same quality of under armour I bought from dicks sporting goods.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Nice, resonable shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are nice, resonably priced summer shoes. I bought them for my husband, and he really likes them!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda J. Robbins

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are super comfortable. I didn’t feel like I needed to ...
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are super comfortable. I didn’t feel like I needed to break them in. They instantly felt like I could walk miles in them.
customer_reviews.author: boojingles2000

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves these shoes. They are light and ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these shoes. They are light and pain free. They ran small with the first order, so I order the next 1/2 size up and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but the actual shoe size is great.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes work well enough for me to do what I need to do. They're a bit smaller (width wise) than I had expected, but the actual shoe size is great.
customer_reviews.author: Average Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great for every day or longs walks
customer_reviews.text: These have held up well with all the wear and tear my 11 year old puts them through. Great for every day or longs walks. She has not complained about the fit or comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: in my opinion are the best. On my feet all day at work and ...
customer_reviews.text: These sneakers, in my opinion are the best. On my feet all day at work and my feet don't bother me at all. I purchased a second pair because I was so worried I wouldn't be able to find the same pair again. Have had my first pair since August of last year and look almost new.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Geffert

customer_reviews.title: VERY Comfortable Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are on only on the second day wearing them but are VERY comfortable. Wide shoe sizes available. Thanks UA!
customer_reviews.author: G. Jones

customer_reviews.title: I have used this shoes for about couple months now ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this shoes for about couple months now and I must I am in pain. I didn't notice it first, but after wearing this shoes long enough, I realize that the right shoe was too thick on sole compare to left one. As a result, my ankle, my entire right leg is in pain. I had to see a doctor about it.
customer_reviews.author: Savan

customer_reviews.title: Love under armor shoes (have 7 pair) but these do ...
customer_reviews.text: Love under armor shoes (have 7 pair) but these do not have good support for a narrow foot. I gave them to my son and he likes them.
customer_reviews.author: CatRN85

customer_reviews.title: She’s for male is hot oink
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the shoes for 12 year old boy he loved the shoes but the color on the shoe is hot pink he will not wear his mom threw all packing away now I am stuck with 50.0 pair of tennis shoes ! The only good thing is the shoes fit me but I personally don’t care Ft them The description said black grey and red ! wrong hot pink! My sorrow!
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and perfect fit ! Half the price of my last pair of running shoes and feel so much better on the road..will buy from again ..
customer_reviews.author: Z. Patterson

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: I wear these all the time. I’ve tried many different types of shoes but these are my all time favorite! I am really tough on shoes so they don’t normally last long but I’ve had these for a year and they are still in good condition
customer_reviews.author: Siara Goodyke

customer_reviews.title: Great comfortable running shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great comfortable running shoes. I am a casual runner, only about 5 miles a week. These shoes are great and a much better option for me than spending an additional $100 or more on running shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really were nice looking shoes but they run very narrow
customer_reviews.author: Josh B.

customer_reviews.title: The color is a friendly color to all other clothing colors and stlyes
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and durable. The style is perfect! The fit is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lorri B.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, thick sole
customer_reviews.text: Good shoe, fits as expected. Weird looking sole, but that’s kinda the style now. And doesn’t look bad on your foot.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Shoes run small
customer_reviews.text: These shoes run small order at least a 1/2 size bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Flash Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for the price. Plus, they go to a size 14!
customer_reviews.text: The Under Armour Man's Dash RN 2 Running Shoes are really good. The padding is very comfortable, the only problem is under your big toe. It seems like your toe is higher then the rest and their is less padding and rubber between your toe and the ground. Other than that one problem these shoes are really nice and they seem like they will last!
customer_reviews.author: Zack

customer_reviews.title: Authentic UnderArmour shoes
customer_reviews.text: Authentic UnderArmour shoes, fit as expected. Arrived in trademark logo packaging with tags attached. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: I love these shoes and wear them everywhere - they're a ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes and wear them everywhere - they're a tad snug, but I like my sneakers that way - I can wear barefoot or with thin socks. Love these! I wish they made them with purple accents!
customer_reviews.author: LS

customer_reviews.title: Really Great shoes for the gym and running except after about ...
customer_reviews.text: Really Great shoes for the gym and running except after about two months of using them the stitching on the toll on both shoes came apart and now has separated . Disappointed, but Other than that great product
customer_reviews.author: Michael Roache

customer_reviews.title: Weird tongue
customer_reviews.text: Tongue flips over easy and shows socks. Have to wear black socks with it or it looks terrible. Liked my other under armour shoes better.
customer_reviews.author: McNabb

customer_reviews.title: Insoles not removable
customer_reviews.text: I love the way these shoes look and the materials they are made of. I noted that the insoles are not removable if this is something you need.
customer_reviews.author: Joanna Whitmire

customer_reviews.title: it's starting to show wear faster than I would like..
customer_reviews.text: My son really likes it. He's 12 and wears the 9 men's and it seem to fit well. My only beef is, it's starting to show wear faster than I would like ... but then my 12 year old is hard on shoes.
customer_reviews.author: M. Carr

customer_reviews.title: very NICE
customer_reviews.text: Ordered my regular size and it was a somewhat small. It is understandable as most running shoes are designed to fit your feet tightly. I opted for 1/2 size larger and they fit much better. Still a little narrow but don't matter. they are comfortable and light. A decent pair of running shoes especially considering the price.
customer_reviews.author: Yen-Ben Cheng

customer_reviews.title: Quick shipping
customer_reviews.text: The shoes fit well. The price was reasonable and I received the shoes quickly.
customer_reviews.author: B Little

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It really well and you cannot beat the price for Under Armour shoes
customer_reviews.author: Ranard Walkee

customer_reviews.title: Good looking sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Good looking sneaker, that meets everyday demands. Whether you're running around everywhere or on your feet all day, these shoes feel great and comfortable. I'm on my feet over eight hours and I do not feel any sort of discomfort at all.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice running shoes for the price. Not a elite shoe but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Shan. M

customer_reviews.title: The tongue at the top of the shoe does not ...
customer_reviews.text: The tongue at the top of the shoe does not cover the entire top part of my foot! This shoe is not true to size in general... I have a narrow size 11 foot and there is no reason why it does not fit!
customer_reviews.author: sunshine412

customer_reviews.title: great price. Daughter says they are a bit uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Cute shoes, great price. Daughter says they are a bit uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: spbow

customer_reviews.title: These are some of the most comfortable shoes i have
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the most comfortable shoes i have. It's the first pair of under armor shoes I've bought but I'll be ordering more
customer_reviews.author: christopher m.

customer_reviews.title: nice packed and arived in time
customer_reviews.text: They fit as I expexted, nice packed and arived in time ! Thank you !
customer_reviews.author: MARICEL MOROSANU

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good brand of shoes. But they're tearing up easly.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Lockaby

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very light and comfy, my work needs a lot walking and those shoes are very comfy meets my expectation.
customer_reviews.author: yohannes tesfe

customer_reviews.title: The sole is great and the mesh type upper is great
customer_reviews.text: my son is on his feet all day, and it gets hot. The sole is great and the mesh type upper is great, he loves these shoes
customer_reviews.author: Karen B

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 14 yr old son who wears size 8. They last good 3-5 months.
customer_reviews.author: Rae Rae

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad, not Great
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. Generally pretty comfortable. I've run up to 5 miles in these. The toe box is just slightly tighter than expected, and the insole seems to be a little shorter than it should be. There's definitely not much arch support. Aside from that, for running on flat, paved, shorter routes these do the trick.
customer_reviews.author: cognoramus

customer_reviews.title: I am so in love with these snakers!
customer_reviews.text: I have never loved a pair of sneakers more!! I will never buy another brand. I feel like I am walking on clouds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: If the shoe fits....
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and light shoe. I use it mostly for sprinting and it works well. I had to get use to the fact my heel is above my toes, beyond that very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Russell Grant

customer_reviews.title: Who thought the tongue not being attached was a good idea? Other than that a decent workout shoe
customer_reviews.text: Who thought the tongue not being attached was a good idea ? Other than that a decent workout shoe. Not a running shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Watkins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe for people with wide feet. They fit great and are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Clark

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 1/2 size larger due to previous comments. They fit great and are very comfortable. I liked my 1st pair, and this is my 2nd pair :)
customer_reviews.author: KO

customer_reviews.title: Half size small
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe. Very comfortable except it is half size too small.
customer_reviews.author: Watermelon

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight & comfortable. Nice looking. Go one width larger if you wear heavy socks
customer_reviews.author: Old- Salt

customer_reviews.title: Seam issues on the side
customer_reviews.text: For the 1st year they were great. Then both shoes started to get splits down the same outside seam of both shoe. I usually expect shoes to for sure last longer than a year
customer_reviews.author: Barry Clark

customer_reviews.title: Read this
customer_reviews.text: For the white version at scheels, lasted me 9 months, wore them stop school, and to sports they last, just after a while get thicker socks it'll rub against , I hope these last just as long as my other ones came in half a size too big I wear a women's 11
customer_reviews.author: Sen

customer_reviews.title: Very good shoe for the money like them a lot
customer_reviews.text: I've been very happy with the shoe price was excellent delivery on time
customer_reviews.author: PBJ44

customer_reviews.title: The Best for the Money!
customer_reviews.text: The Under Armour Women's Dash 2 are so comfortable. They run true to size and have great arch support.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, look great, unbeatable price!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first pair of UA shoes and definitely won't be the last. These shoes are so comfortable and look great! They don't get all "pointy" at the toe like most other running shoes which is great! This is the best looking / performing shoe for the money hands down!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Miclette, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Runs a bit tight length wise
customer_reviews.text: Although it looks nice, a 9 was a bit tight, need to clip my nails very short to make it fit just fine
customer_reviews.author: Ebrahim H Ghazvini Zadeh

customer_reviews.title: Best I’ve ever had
customer_reviews.text: Never worn under armor shoes, now they are all I will buy, love the comfort
customer_reviews.author: Ron Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved the shoes. He only like a shoe with the black sole and these are perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda B. Mack

customer_reviews.title: Wrong size
customer_reviews.text: Based upon the other answered questions I ordered these hoping they were a 7M. They came as a 9.5M. The shoes look great, just way too big.
customer_reviews.author: msole

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe, great price, perfect for casual wear and mid-range walking.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Definitely Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of running shoes. Fits well even without being broken into. 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Price was good.
customer_reviews.text: Love the weight of these shoes. Light and easy to walk in. Last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes. They feel nice and sturdy and look nice as well. I think my husband will really like them.
customer_reviews.author: Ang D

customer_reviews.title: Best tennis shoe I’ve worn in a while
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is lightweight, supportive and perfect for playing tennis
customer_reviews.author: Cain Vallot

customer_reviews.title: but they are pretty spot on with size and we've never had an ...
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend loves these shoes. He did already know his size since Under Armor is his go to, but they are pretty spot on with size and we've never had an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Austin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and good for the gym. Definitely worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Hamadeeeno

customer_reviews.title: THESE ARE NOT TRUE TO FIT
customer_reviews.text: I wear men's size 9. I wanted to make sure that these fit so I ordered a 9-1/2. They were wayyyy to small. They looked more like a women's size 8 than a men's 9-1/2.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Fine shoes
customer_reviews.text: They’re fine. I’ve got wide feet. They’re tight. But fine.
customer_reviews.author: William Merklinger

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Brand
customer_reviews.text: I've only worn them once, but I can say they fit perfect and of awesome quality!
customer_reviews.author: KickRocks84

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: that are some great shoes for me will buy a there pair
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect value
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband’s birthday and he loves them. He wears them everyday!!
customer_reviews.author: sportsfan1

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, lightweight, breathable. Don't even need to wear socks with these. Great for running. Didn't need to be broken in at all. Only thing I wish was that they had added some reflective strips for nighttime running.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Waste!!!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are not at all comfortable for running and it lasted only 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: aman yadav

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not comfortable to wear all day your feet will ach all day
customer_reviews.author: Liv's

customer_reviews.title: shoe fits great and are not to tight for my wide feet
customer_reviews.text: shoe fits great and are not to tight for my wide feet. However, visually they are not as eye pleasing as i thought they would be. Kind of look low budget
customer_reviews.author: Ray L Green

customer_reviews.title: He likes the fit and how comfortable they are
customer_reviews.text: I have bought my grandson approximately 6 pairs of Under Armour shoes. He likes the fit and how comfortable they are.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Barrett

customer_reviews.title: thankfully the return/exchange policy is super easy and ill be getting the new ones within ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a half size bigger so they'd fit my boyfriend.. they're still too small. Sending them back this week, thankfully the return/exchange policy is super easy and ill be getting the new ones within a week!
customer_reviews.author: paige wehner

product_meta.title: Under Armour Men's Ua Dash Rn 2 1285671-001 Training Shoes
feature_bullets: Flex grooves in the forefoot increase flexibility for a natural stride
Rubber outsole provides traction and runs into the medial midsole for added support
EVA foam midsole for shock absorption
